column4: what are the reasons for programmers to use linux? i heard something about better libraries or something

It's much more programmer-friendly, but you can configure any environment of your choice to be convenient
maybe you could use come channel like ##linux, ##programming or any of the languages of your choice.

Not exclusively, anyone can use linux
